question_paper.question_paper_name: IIT M QUIZ 1 FOUNDATION DIPLOMA QPB2 16 Oct 2022

questions.question_text_1: For the following sentence, choose whether the type of sentence is simple, compound or complex.   The child is hungry, therefore it is crying.
question_texts: For the following sentence, choose whether the type of sentence is simple, compound or complex.   The child is hungry, therefore it is crying.

questions.question_text_1: For the following sentence, choose whether the type of sentence is simple, compound or complex.  The earth moves round the sun.
question_texts: For the following sentence, choose whether the type of sentence is simple, compound or complex.  The earth moves round the sun.

questions.question_text_1: How many independent clauses are there in the sentence given below:  She slammed the door angrily
question_texts: How many independent clauses are there in the sentence given below:  She slammed the door angrily

questions.question_text_1: In the following sentence, identify the complement(s) of the verbs that are underlined.   My grandfather left my sister all his money.
question_texts: In the following sentence, identify the complement(s) of the verbs that are underlined.   My grandfather left my sister all his money.

questions.question_text_1: Identify the independent clause in the following sentence.  This road leads to the next town, which is famous for its furniture.
question_texts: Identify the independent clause in the following sentence.  This road leads to the next town, which is famous for its furniture.

options.option_text: This road leads to the next town
Which is famous for its furniture

questions.question_text_1: Hari and Rohan ___ leading the team.
question_texts: Hari and Rohan ___ leading the team.

question_texts: When there are two objects for a verb, the first is called the ________ object and the second is called the ___________ object.

questions.question_text_1: Identify the number of suffixes in the following sentence.  It was a warm summer month: the flowers were blooming, the birds were singing, and the days seemed endless.

questions.question_text_1: Choose an option that fits well for the following situation.  Inviting a classmate you met during shopping for dinner
question_texts: Choose an option that fits well for the following situation.  Inviting a classmate you met during shopping for dinner

options.option_text: Can you come with me for dinner
Will you join me for dinner
Would you like to join me for dinner
Could you please come with me for dinner

questions.question_text_1: ‘Let us do the meeting in the conference room on the fourth floor.’ A softened version of this sentence is ____________.
question_texts: ‘Let us do the meeting in the conference room on the fourth floor.’ A softened version of this sentence is ____________.

options.option_text: Can we do the meeting in the fourth floor conference room?
Could we conduct the meeting in the conference room on the fourth floor ,please?
I was wondering if we could do the meeting in the fourth floor conferenceroom.

questions.question_text_1: Choose the appropriate pauses for the following passage as you hear in the audio:  Yes I do speak but I feel more like a storyteller because wherever I go I share a story with everyone
question_texts: Choose the appropriate pauses for the following passage as you hear in the audio:  Yes I do speak but I feel more like a storyteller because wherever I go I share a story with everyone

options.option_text: //Yes/ I do speak/ but I feel more like a storyteller because wherever I go Ishare a story with everyone//
//Yes I do speak but I feel more like a storyteller/ because wherever I go Ishare a story with/ everyone//
//Yes I do speak but I feel/ more like a storyteller because/ wherever I go Ishare a story/ with everyone//
//Yes I/ do speak but I feel more like/ a storyteller because wherever I/ go Ishare a/ story with everyone//

questions.question_text_1: Complete the following mail usig appropriate options given in the subquestions.  To: xyz@gmail.com  Subject: (1)_________  (2)_____,  (3)____ John, who is starting today as our Customer Service Representative. He will be providing technical support and assistance to our users and making sure they enjoy the best experience with our products.  (4)____ John in person and congratulate him on the new role!  (5)_____,  Michael
